name: No.04 Bois de Balincourt Perfume Oil
about: Fragrance Family:.Scent Type:.Key Notes:.About:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: Fragrance/Parfum, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract.Geraniol, Benzyl Benzoate, Limonene, Citral, Linalool..The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Use roll-on perfume oil any time you desire. Apply to pulse points (neck, chest and wrist),  lightly rolling the ball on the skin to release the fragrance...Bottle is 100% recyclable just remove the rollerball and casing before disposal. Secondary packaing is 100% recyclable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far one of the best perfume oils I have ever bought. I have found my new everyday scent. 10/10 recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I stumbled across this fragrance while sampling scents in the Sephora store over two years ago, looking for a signature scent. I can't remember what my go to fragrance was at the time but since I discovered this one, I rarely wear anything else. Earthy and herby, it doesn't have that perfumy quality that set off a headache like so many more expensive (and really cheap) fragrances. I occasionally layer with Juliette Has A Gun's Sunny Side Up, which smells like sandlewood. Careful, though. Sunny Side Up can take over. I spray it very lightly across my back.  I get tons of compliments on this fragrance! I have both the travel spray and mini roller ball bottle in my purse. I buy the larger roller ball bottle and refill the same mini.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I often default to my spray perfumes but whenever I remember to use this perfume oil I get the loveliest compliments from everyone, no matter where I am. Strangers, colleagues, my friends comment that this smells warm and tranquil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After wearing this 4-5 hours I felt it was better suited for a male.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just got the sample of this, and maybe they messed up the formula or something, but it smells like pickles. Like dill. I sprayed it once and my brother said who is eating pickles??. My mom agrees it smells like pickles. It also gives me a headache, just getting a whiff of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Enchanting and luxurious, this perfume captivates with a symphony of  notes. Each spritz is a promise of elegance, enveloping the wearer in a veil of sophistication. It's the quintessence of allure, making it the ultimate fragrance for those who seek to make a statement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I discovered this fragrance over 4 years ago and no matter how many times I wander to find something different out of curiosity and hype about other ones, I always come back to this one. I love the oil version compared to the spray, it seems to last so much longer on me and I don't use as much product so the bottle truly lasts so much longer. Cannot live without this!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of the perfume oil with a recent order, and I don't know if the issue was the fragrance, my skin or my nose, but this didn't work on me at all. All I could smell was... hay? I also got a headache soon after applying just a small amount of the oil, although I obviously don't know for certain if that was caused by the product or something else. For me, the actual scent did not match the description at all, so this is probably more of a definitely try before you buy kind of fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had gotten a free sample that came with a past order from Sephora, the sample was the best lotion to me, just 1 drop would last DAYS, the scent would stay if i put it on scarfs, purse, you name it and even on my skin, it would last all day smelling amazing, as initially. It was a very elegant touch that make me feel boss.  So i decided to get the full lotions since i loved it so much. Hmm iu2019ve had to put 6-8 u201cdropsu201d rolled on my body and the thing doesnu2019t smell the same. It wears off, i feel like i have to put so much of it and it doesnu2019t do what the sample. Iu2019m sad about because i really liked how the sample worked on me.  Not buying again. I heard Le Labo 33 is better, i will try that next. Wish me luck!

reviews.review_title: Love the smell, wish it lasted longer.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The scent is a 10, but it does not last. I love it so much I carry the small size with me to reapply regularly. It is my most favorite smell ever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s absolutely DILL-lightful (DELI-ghtful?) if you tryna be up in here smelling like a pickle!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the roll-on feature and the scent is spot on and long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best scent ever! I got it as a sample and will buy this again and again. Iu2019d never used a perfume oil before but love how the scent lasts all day! My skin is pretty sensitive and this has never broken me out or caused irritation either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wish this scent lasted longer on me!! The scent itself is delightful, a perfect woody unisex scent. But I expected a perfume oil to last longer throughout the day but I after 2 hours i canu2019t smell it at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: . reminds me of my santal 33 with a different dry down. it has a floral dry down on my body. works beautiful with my skin. love itttt

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The bottle is MUCH smaller than I anticipated, but this has AMAZING SCENT AND STAYING POWER. I had to return the EDT because it only lasted while I sprayed it but this one truly stayed on for a couple of hours. Itu2019s a perfect scent; extremely happy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty close to Le Labou2019s Santal 33.  I have this in perfume oil and spray, but I also love the reed diffuser with this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: An exact dupe for Santal 33! Smells great and lasts long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes
reviews.review_text: I got this product !! Despite the price u2026 I gotta confess that the essence of this fragrance is really good . It stays with me for over 8 hours . Love it

reviews.review_title: One way ticket to baby powder city
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super nice upon first application, smelled expensive and light white floral, but became pure baby powder scent within about twenty minutes. The oil formulation does have good staying power, which is unfortunate in my case because the scent is just not right for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started wearing this f years ago and I have had more people ask me what it is that any other fragrance, ever.  Itu2019s crazy.  And I have some of the most expensive perfumes in my vanity and this is the one I get complimented on the most.  Itu2019s so good and stays on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably my favorite perfume right now. It is classy, woodsy, and very different. It has a soft masculine quality that gets a lot of attention.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This over the past year has become my favourite perfume and I always get super passionate compliments when I wear it. My previous favourite was ombre leather by Tom Ford but I think it might have been eclipsed by this. Such a warm woody spicy calm fragrance. I love it. I'll definitely be buying a second bottle. Just a note that the bottles are small but they last absolutely forever.

reviews.review_title: Smells like self tanner gone bad
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive this after reading that it was as good as Santal 33  Absolutely horrid on me. The only way I can describe it is the same as bad self tanner. Once it gets that awful sm smell.

reviews.review_title: Lots of winks with this one.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My signature scent.  I get asked what I'm wearing all the time when I have this on.  I was told that not only did it smell incredible, but also that it smelled expensive.  Good enough for me.  Lasts for hours with just a bit on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as one of the 2 free samples and I just fell in love with it. I actually use it around my neckline before I fall asleep and after I shower because itu2019s just such a calming and relaxing scent. It kind of reminds me of what the spas smell like when I go to a resort. The scent lingers forever! I put it on after I shower and wear my robe and it lasts on my robe all week long. Not a feminine scent, thereu2019s no floral or vanilla kind of notes but itu2019s just a bomb scent but you can totally layer it with other scents and amplify it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, notSure skin tone
reviews.review_text: Obsessed. It just gives expensive. I work in corporate beauty where everyone is all about fragrances and I get asked regularly if Iu2019m wearing le labo. Do yourself a favor and buy this!

reviews.review_title: I want to order these by the case.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I want like 10 of these. One for my coat pocket, the car, my purse, the bathroom downstairs, the bathroom upstairs, and then 5 to have on hand in case one shatters on the floor (recent, sad experience) or to give a friend who I really love. Not that the scent doesn't last, because it does...and it's so subtle and elegant you can reapply throughout the day if you want or let it blend into your skin throughout the day. I wear Santal 33 from Le Labo, and while I love it, the price tag is steep, to say the least. I get the same amount of compliments when wearing Bois de Balincourt...and pay a fraction of the price. Plus? The oil feels great on my skin, unlike drying alcohol-based perfumes.
Amazing scent, very woody like. Wears ALL DAY no need to reapply and it stays on your clothes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I do not understand how anyone would dislike this. This smells earthy but also fresh somehow. It isn't my usual scent profile, but it's so beautiful, I can't stop smelling it. It smells very luxurious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells EXACTLY like Le Labou2019s Santal 33 on me, and it lasts just as long -at a fraction of the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells like a sweet, clean, vanilla dream to me!  It doesnu2019t smell like dill or pickles at all. I totally disagree. I wore it around some friends last night and commented on it. It still smells beautiful this morning when I woke up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Probably the most interesting perfume Iu2019ve smelled. This oil came as a sample for one of my most recent perfume purchases. When I tried it on, I couldnu2019t initially determine if I liked it. I took a nap and smelled my wrist again. Loved it! It smells nutty, & clean/powdery on me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample and I'm SO hooked on this scent! Not sure why, but this oil is so beautiful! plus it lasts and lasts! The description doesn't do it justice. My new favourite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Instantly ready to break up with my beloved Mugler Angel star. Iu2019ve been an exclusive Angel user for years until now. I still love my Angel but this oil has got to be the absolute yummiest perfume Iu2019ve ever worn. I got a sample with a purchase (this is why I love Sephora, for the samples!) and this sample has paid off because Iu2019m going to be a loyal user moving forward.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just a bit of the sample got on my hand when opening the sample vial. When I first smelled it in the bottle, it smelled good in an interesting way. I really liked it. Fast-forward a half hour to me walking into the kitchen and I kept smelling pickles. Got stronger in the car. Finally realized it was the perfume. Just that tiny amount smelled strongly of dill.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this in a recent order.Initially I thought the scent was nice.It seemed to project well and was long lasting.The problem was that it gave me a long lasting headache. There must be an Ingredient that Iu2019m sensitive to

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, I was very excited to tey this sample. I thought this smelled lovely and interesting and unique when i first tried it on. But after 5 minutes, my son came into the room and asked me if I was cooking because he smelled Curry. I said no, and asked him to smell my wrist. He said yeap. Thats it. It smells like coconut chicken curry... So while it smells lovely. Probably wont be buying the full size bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance has to be layered with another scent (vanilla). Otherwise, it gives me a headache.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the smell but I got a mini rollerball in a kit and it has a hard time actually dispensing the oil

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this. I see a lot of reviews of a pickle smell, but on me, it drys down to a spicy and sweet cardamom/cinnamon/nutmeg. I really like it and will probably purchase the full size. I always say try fragrances first, they smell different on everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried a sample of this oil after reading an article where this scent was referenced. It has a super strong initial scent of fennel/anise/licorice and Iu2019m not a fan of that. Actually, the smell of black licorice gives me a headache so I initially hated this scent. But underneath the strong licorice scent, there is a lovely, sensual, soft aroma that I like. Itu2019s a bit mature for me but nice. Unfortunately I cannot stand that hit of fennel/anise/licorice so this one isnu2019t for me. It does initially smell better on my skin than straight from the bottle but after a few hours it started to remind me of something a more mature lady would wear. A previous review referred to the scent as something youu2019d smell in a fancy bathroom and I could actually see that. Maybe a signature hotel scent or something. I gave it 3 stars, itu2019s lovely if you live licorice but not a scent for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample of this and it straight up smells like urine. After reading some of the reviews I could see where it might smell like dill...it just smells musty. I threw it away and I can still smell it in the trash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this fragrance for about a year and continue to love it. It kind of smells like pickles but in a beautiful way. I am also sensitive to fragrance and this doesnu2019t make me sneeze!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Picked this up after reading people rave about the similarity to Santal 33. I tried it a few times, hoping my first impression was wrong, but each time it had a rotten, sour smell. After a few months, I finally just threw it away. It may cost less than Le Labo but it's still not worth the price.

reviews.review_title: If you find itu2019s incomplete, layer with vanilla
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m soooo on the fence about this fragrance. Firstly I prefer the oil version over the eau, itu2019s more rich smelling if that makes sense (idk). But overall it smells different than anything Iu2019ve smelled before, itu2019s just kinda woody and lightly smells like herbs in my opinion? And my dad said he smells a hint of coconut which I agree with. However, how Iu2019ve come to love this is by layering with vanilla!! It adds that necessary touch of warmth and sweetness I feel the fragrance needs. I use Vanilla Woods by 7 Virtues and Iu2019m loving this combo. But I wonu2019t be purchasing a full size because layering is too much work lol Iu2019m trying to find the perfect fragrance for me without needing to add more notes on top because this fragrance just feels incomplete to me and like itu2019s missing something. But remember fragrance is subjective so there really isnu2019t one answer. I just felt it wasnu2019t for me, if you like sweet and warm scents you can skip this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Mom loved the earthy smell. She says the oil is smaller but stronger! Pricy but good.

reviews.review_title: Feels like I'm in a forest
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As described, this is an earthy and woodsy perfume. Top notes of sandalwood, amber wood, and vetiver. I bought this knowing what vetiver and sandalwood smell like in their pure form. Definitely not for you if your prefer sweet and floral perfumes. Do your research first before buying unfamiliar perfume.

Got a small sample and thought it sounded fancy. Lol! Boy I wish I would've sprayed it on something else to smell it before I sprayed it on myself. It reeks like pickles!! I've heard sandalwood in perfumes can evoke thoughts of pickles for some people. I guess I'm one of those people. If this doesn't smell like pickles to you, at least be aware that maybe 25-50% of people WILL smell you and think you've just demolished an entire bag of dill pickle chips, or maybe a whole jar of pickles. ud83eudd22

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot say I have had a bad experience with this scent as others have reviewed.  I wear this scent and everyone compliments me anf says I smell warm anf inviting,I always get males and females alike complimenting me. It is such a wonderful scent and on me ru s very sweet and warm,My chemistry blends well with it. I guess it all depends on your own chemistry and perhaps on some it just does not mesh well but as for me,I adore this scent amongst others in Sephora Niche catgy. Because they all have unique scents unlike whats om the market nowadays.

Wildly inconsistent scent. When it smells correct it's amazing but when it's wrong it smells awful like other reviewers suggested. I've ordered various sizes of the spray and oil - they're all inconsistent and typically need to be exchanged. Two stars because of poor quality control.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this in the holiday sample pack u2014 YUCK. On me this smelled like pungent, sour milk! I guess I could say the longevity is good, because I couldnu2019t get the stench off for hours, even after I washed my wrists.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with this fragrance the minute I smelled it at my local Sephora. I was not familiar with this fragrance house and never bothered testing their samples. What an underrated fragrance! It deserves way more attention! This is my new signature scent; it makes me feel so peaceful and zen whenever I wear it. Very earthy/woody notes that dries down to almost a warm floral scent on my skin. I love love LOVE this! Especially the oil version for its ease of use. Already planning on buying multiples of this!

reviews.review_title: have to keep my vanity stocked with this scent
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just got a sample with a sephora online purchase and now I'm here to purchase. this scent is amazing. after hitting 45 I've been into more woodsy and warm scents and this is such a beautiful fragrance and very similar to a scent from 7 virtues, Saltille vanilla which I always keep stocked on my vanity year round. this is another I'll add to my always have to have on hand bottles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've gotten nothing but compliments since purchasing this. It is small, but I have found it's the perfect subtle flair. I like to rub a bit through the ends of my hair haha so it's nice that it's an oil formula. I've also added a bit of unscented moisturizer when applying to help it stay longer. I think I've convinced 2 or 3 of my friends to purchase this as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I pair this with the perfume and it smells incredible! I always get a ton of compliments. When it settles it smells so fresh and clean. I would definitely recommend pairing the two.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very weak scent, but has some nice tones to it. Almost like a Laundry scent, good for the workplace but not too appealing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this scent and get compliments everywhere I go.  I do, however, wish that it had more staying power given the price point.  But, I love it and will ever switch to another perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: #4 is the greatest smelling oil in the World! Nothimg compares to this smell. I think it smell better than Satal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume oil - it smells like a sexy nature hike in California. Long lasting fragrance and easy application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just received a sample of this perfume oil and it is a perfect dupe for (the much more expensive) Santal 33. I love it. Not overpowering and the scent lasts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love everything Maison Louis Marie, so had to try this and am very glad I did. Perfect thing to keep in bag when I need a little touch up!
Small but mighty! I have had this roller for 3 years now and still holding on. I get compliments every time I wear this scent. It's truly my favorite, not too strong - not too light! A must try!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome scent, the No.4.  It has a little bit of the smoky santal or sandalwood  but with a feminine touch. Itu2019s not the scent a man could wear like the le labo santal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t want to believe the dill hype. Spent the money and took a risk. Ughhhhh. Lesson learned. It smells like smokey dill. I wish I wouldu2019ve listened to the reviews.
I smelled this on a client and ordered it that day. I love it on myself just as much. Itu2019s sophisticated and easy. Definitely my new favorite fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got it as a sample and fell in love. Definitely not flowery or sweet. Itu2019s earthy and woodsy. The eau de parfum smells slightly different from the oil but they both smell nice. Ended up ordering both. The scent doesnu2019t last as long as other perfumes but these days youu2019re lucky if you find a perfume that lasts long. Itu2019s a bit pricey but definitely worth it if you like perfumes and you like the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Im on my 4th or 5th bottle and I love it but the last one I bought the smell wasnu2019t as strong :(  Still ok, but it was better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's my first time trying such an earthy and woodsy scent so I hesitated and decided to try the oil as I would assume it would linger on the skin for longer. I also got a sample of the EDP to test the difference. Well, the difference to me is that the EDP is lighter, fresher, and reminds me of crisp spring or autumn weather in the woods with a little chilly breeze in the air. It's invigorating. The oil seems to hold more of the spicy notes and I'm not so much a fan of that. I will be returning it and purchasing the EDP instead. The lasting quality of the oil was okay. I would say it stays strong for about 2 hrs, from then on it declines in scent throw pretty quickly. Although, I can still faintly smell it on my wrist. I can understand the dill like smell but, it's definitely not what I would think of first when I smell this. It's warmer and sweeter than that. In saying all that, this is not bad, just not my favourite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know perfume is definitely objective, but I found this scent overwhelmingly gross. Its really overpowering, and smells musty and old. It gave me a headache within 30 minutes of trying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent and this oil lasts all day and night on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this sent because a few articles recommended it as an alternative to Le Labo Santal 33. They were not wrong! Smells just like it. Iu2019m very happy with this fragrance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I havenu2019t worn perfume since high school because everything was overpowering and bothered me. I will be wearing this the rest of my life. Itu2019s perfect

I get compliments all the time. First time I have had a perfume oil & I now prefer it over spray. Roll onto the inside of wrists, behind ears, inner elbow crease. Scent lasts all day.  Have used for more than 6 months and haven't even gone through half of the bottle. Similar to Le Labo scent 33.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this so much! The oil works better for me than the spray because it lasts ALL day and I only use a little on my wrists and behind my ears. Had this for almost two years and I only got through 1/4 of the bottle. A little goes a long way!

reviews.review_title: Something is wrong with this batch?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Something is wrong - the scent is 100% not the same as samples previously received. Should smell woodsy and cedarlike, but it smelled like sour floral baby powder? I actually thought the label was wrong and had the wrong product inside...  I purchased as part of a Rouge Reward, and attempted to return because the scent difference- they would not refund. Customer service on this was ashame - wasted a $15 reward. They could have issued store credit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Louis Marie perfume smells nice but not to overpowering! great for summertime it smells really clean and I love that the ingredients are clean too so that is a plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very beautiful scent.  Smells a little spicier on my skin than the EDP.  The cinnamon comes through much more in the oil form where as I get more sandlewood and an almost floral note with the perfume spray.  The scent lasts quite a few hours with just a small dab of the oil.  It doesn't seem to project and stays very close to the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample, and it could be such a lovely, heavenly scent if the dry finish didn't settle on a sharp pickle note. That said, I have received compliments while wearing this, but I can't make myself truly like it. I can't get over the finish. :-(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a feminie smell. It mixes with my natural smell beautifully and I get compliments whenever I wear it. I've read others getting dill or pickle smell, and even searching for those notes I cant smell it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this with my last Sephora order. *I have not tried the full sized oil* The sample is beyond beautiful! It's a very unique, woody scent. I don't smell the cinnamon and nutmeg, but I do smell the woods, and I just can't stop sniffing my wrist. From what I just read, people are saying the sample is good, but not the full sized. I would recommend trying a sample from a full size before buying, if Sephora has a tester. I'm in LOVE with the sample. It really is unique and beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wish this smelled good HOWEVER when I put it on all I could smell was dill. It smells exactly like dill potato chips and as soon as I realized I just couldn't smell anything else.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is way off the line of scents that I normally wear.  I'm a floral girl, and this was so much more woodsy and spicy.  Once it dried down though, it smelled like pickles.  Full blown jar of dills.

Iu2019m one of those people who doesnu2019t get it. To me this smells like a scent for a very popular candle was made into a perfume because people loved the candle version so much. Iu2019m not a scent expert, so probably donu2019t listen to me. But the scent is a little cloying and not so much beautiful human as notable room scent. I thought maybe it was just my body chemistry but I smelled something exactly like it on someone else recently and it was exactly the same. I give three stars for its projection and supposedly being non toxic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells light and clean. Doesnu2019t give me a headache, lasts long and smells better than the perfume version.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For me it's very long lasting and has some notes that I like. I wore it daily at first, but at some point the dill-like scent that others have mentioned started to overwhelm. A unique and oddly warm yet sharp fragrance. I wear it once every month or so now and probably won't buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the travel size roll-on and I'm pleasantly surprised!  Reviews were mixed, but that's the case with any fragrance because it's so very personal.  I decided to give this one a try and I'm not disappointed.  The roll-on is oil-based, so be mindful of that if you decide to get the roll-on.  It didn't bother me a bit, and I find that oil-based scents are often longer lasting, but generally more subtle.  This works for me for a day fragrance.  The scent profile is sweet and warm, less traditionally-masculine than some of the other woody smells I've gotten, and that neither appeals nor detracts from the fragrance for me, but I thought I'd put that out there in case you're preferring something in a more traditional gender.  This could wear well for either gender, but because there's some underlying sweetness in the fragrance, if sweet scents are not your thing, you might want to try this one in the store before you buy it.  I definitely smell the sandalwood and the amber, but I also smell something slightly fruity.  Could just be how it's mixing with my body chemistry, but I'm really happy with this fragrance.  It's unique, I can't recall smelling another one like it, and I'm probably going to end up buying a bigger bottle when I use this one up.
Ever since I tried the PLAYA shampoo and conditioner I've been obsessed with the scent. I finally found something that smells like it! and its so cheap :) 10/10 recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My signature sent. Thatu2019s it. The only fragrance I use.

reviews.review_title: The scent of a classic cashmere sweater

You could wear this to the office, to the beach, on a hike or special date night. This is a classic cut cashmere sweater. It is in the same vein as Le Labo Santal 33, but not the same. If you like one, you will probably enjoy the other. I just love Bois de Balincourt!

reviews.review_title: love love love this amazing scent!!

reviews.review_text: Love This Earthy, Fresh, & Mysterious Scent  This is an AMAZING scent. I got the sample in a spray and instantly fell in love. Iu2019m from California and if Manhattan Beach had a scent, this is it. Earthy, clean, and invigorating. I am usually into a sweet/citrus smells but this really captivated my senses. I love sandalwood and cedar wood mixed with the vetiver. It definitely has a NoHo, hippie California vibe and I love wearing to Yoga, Gym, work, and anywhere really because it does have a mood to it.   I like the oil a lot - although pricey, a little goes along way and lasts. Sometimes I mix it with a my Black Opium scent to lighten it up. I love it!! I did get the spray version first and have to say I like the oil WAY better bc it lasts all day!!   If you like earthy, sexy, and laid back scents - this one is perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Guys, you have no idea how long I've been looking for my signature scent. I've always dreamed of finding that scent that people recognized me by, and got me compliments! But since I can't afford $300 for a bottle of Le Labo, I had to find a dupe. Thank God I stumbled upon this perfume oil at a boutique and immediately fell in love with it. My husband got it for me and as soon as I started wearing it, people starting asking if I was wearing Le Labo Santal 33! ANYTIME I'm around someone who knows what Le Labo is, they ask me this. So that's how you know it's the perfect dupe! I think the key ingredient is sandalwood oil which is $150 a bottle from Young Living, it's a very expensive and luxurious oil. So I think $57 for a bottle is a great deal, especially considering this bottle lasts SO long and is super cute and perfect for travel. I've had it for about a year and wear it almost every day, and it's still half full! Such a good value. Seriously, stop buying Santal 33 and buy this. You won't regret it! And Maison Louis Marie, if you want to sponsor me I'm @lifeoverstuff on Instagram and I will share my love for you all day every day. Sincerely, a girl obsessed with smell and fragrance.

reviews.review_title: Great dupe for Le labo Santal 33

On the plus side, this perfume oil has a lot of staying power, I put a small dab on the inside of my wrist and could still smell it the next day!

If you are interested in perfume oils I would highly recommend Amuze Fragrance. I ended up purchasing a perfume oil from them after I made this purchase, and it's on a whole different level. Super long lasting and a little goes a long way. They are vegan, alcohol-free, cruelty-free, paraben-free, and phthalate-free. They aren't sold at Sephora but they are worth a shot if you are looking for a perfume oil.  As far as whether or not I recommend No. 04 Bois de Balincourt Perfume Oil, I'm undecided. Reading the reviews it seems to last well on some people, it just didn't for me.

reviews.review_text: I usually hate perfumes. I tend to make my own essential oil blends at home. One day I smelled this in store because I was intrigued by the u201ccleanu201d fragrance selection. I was hoping that I could find something nice for my fiance that didnu2019t give us either of a headache. Wasnu2019t expecting to find anything for me. Let me tell yu2019all.... It was love at first smell.  I typically make my blends with vetiver, cedar, rose, patchouli, and a couple others so when I looked at the ingredients I was and also wasnu2019t surprised. Itu2019s a very unique yet enticing and familiar smell. Not too musky and woodsy but not too powdery or floral either. Itu2019s a beautiful balance. I tried the spray at the store too but I donu2019t like a lot of alcohol in my products, and it also didnu2019t linger in nearly as pleasant as this oil does.  When I got home my fiance held me a little longer and said I smelled really good u263aufe0f (I found something for him too that he liked - lazy Sunday morning by replica) Next day, I went back and bought myself the oil in full size. I contemplated getting the discovery kit but this one is too good I probably wouldnu2019t even care much to try the other scents.  Iu2019ll definitely be repurchasing for myself and may even buy one for my mom! I suggest trying both the oil and spray in store first though as our biological chemistry is different.  Also, I like the roller. It allows you to use a light amount which is really all you need. I think sometimes people think that a dropper is better but itu2019s easier to waste and use too much with those. Itu2019s also more spill proof with a roller, which for $60, you definitely want. Iu2019m an at home alchemist so take it from someone with a lot of essential-oils-in-my-bag-experiences.

Disillusioned, I went through the other Maison Louis Marie Fragrances in search of a different scent I could make my signature, and I ended up Sampling the whole lot.  Strangely, after three weeks of using each fragranceu2014 I couldnu2019t believe it, but I became obsessed with No. 4!  This scent is so incredibly complex! It reminds me of driving through misty coastal redwoods on the way to Muir Beach. It has such a unique and different character. When actually applied to the skin, it warms beautifully and dries down to a delicious clean powdery scent.  The oil lasts about 10 hours on me. It usually lasts about 4 hours as a perfume smell with a few foot silage, but then transitions into a lovely skin smell.  It also lasts beautifully on my clothes. I had to purchase the perfume for that little added kick.  This is going to be my u2018Fallu2019 perfume for the rest of my life. Simply fantastic.

That was the last time I actively participated in perfume, until I found this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so happy Sephora has these in stock! i used to order online from a shop in LA but having these in Sephora makes it more convenient. A sharp, woody and spicy/earthy scent. Smells ALMOST identical to Santal 33 which i have the spray perfume of.  If you're looking for something long lasting - definitely try this out. Santal on its own has a ridiculously awesome staying power but is also ridiculously pricey.  I highly recommend this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love, LOVE this scent. It's subtle yet intoxicating, woody and a bit sweet. The oil has good staying power and is a good value for the amount you get. After years of wearing sandalwood and rose oils, I intent to make this my new scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love MLM and am so excited they are available at Sephora! This scent is sandalwood-y and warm but still fresh, a twist on Santal 33. The fragrance oil lasts a long time but stays close to the body.

reviews.review_title: Bois de Balincourt is a stunner!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm thrilled Sephora now carries Maison Louis Marie perfume oils! No. 04 Bois de Balincourt is a stunner on me. First whiff reveals sandalwood in its purest form. When I roll it on me it is extremely woody, almost sharp. Within seconds the wood softens. This wood is warm and dry and has practically no weight - sort of like fresh sawdust shavings. As it develops on my skin the sandalwood always stays in the forefront, but soon the spices make their appearance. The nutmeg on me is eloquent, soft as a whisper and very warm. This never becomes a true spice scent on me. It remains woodsy and mysterious and has an unusual good quality paper with a watermark element to it. As the oil dries down it gets just the slightest bit sweeter, almost like a violet candy. I can apply liberally and it lasts forever on my skin. I get a solid 8-12 hours of enjoyment and it lasts even longer in my hair.  If you like Santal 33 or Commodity Book, I think you'll love this. Because it's an oil is not as astringent. This is just gorgeous and I'm so excited to own it!
